content: ज्ञा {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> (जानाति, जानीते, जज्ञौ, जज्ञे, अज्ञासीत्-अज्ञास्त, ज्ञातुं, ज्ञात) {@--1@} To know (in all senses), to learn, become acquainted with; मा ज्ञासीस्त्वं सुखी रामो यदकार्षीत्स रक्षसां <ls>Bk. 15. 9.</ls> {@--2@} To know, be aware of, be familiar or conversant with; जाने तपसो वीर्यं <ls>Ś. 3. 1</ls>; जानन्नपि हि मेधावी जडवल्लोक आचरेत् <ls>Ms. 2. 110</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">123</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 148.</ls> {@--3@} To find out, ascertain, investigate; ज्ञायतां कः कः कार्यार्थीति <ls>Mk. 9.</ls> {@--4@} To comprehend, apprehend, understand, feel, experience; as in दुःखज्ञ, सुखज्ञ &c. {@--5@} To test, try, know the true character of; आपत्सु मित्रं जानीयात् <ls>H. 1. 72</ls>; <ls>Chāṇ. 21.</ls> {@--6@} To recognise; म त्वं दृष्ट्वा न पुनरलकां ज्ञास्यसे कामचारिन् <ls>Me. 63.</ls> {@--7@} To regard, consider, know to be; जानामि त्वां प्रकृतिपुरुषं कामरूपं मघोनः <ls>Me. 6.</ls> {@--8@} To act, engage in (with <ab>gen.</ab> of the instrument); सर्पिषो जानीते <ls>Sk.</ls> ‘he engages in sacrifice with clarified butter (सर्पि षः = सर्पिषा). {@--9@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To acknowledge, approve, allow. {@--10@} To recognise as one's own, take possession of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (ज्ञापयति, ज्ञपयति) {@--1@} To announce, inform, make acquainted with, make known, notify. {@--2@} To request, ask (<ab>Atm.</ab>). {@--3@} To sharpen. {@--4@} To satisfy. {@--5@} To praise. {@--6@} To immolate, kill (as an animal). {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (जिज्ञासते) {@--1@} To desire to know, investigate, ascertain; <ls>R. 2. 26</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 33</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 91.</ls> {@--2@} To conjecture, suppose, guess.
